original_solution_mapping.L1: In a class with 20 kids, 1/2 of the students have already fallen asleep so 20/2 = <<20/2=10>>10 kids are already asleep
original_solution_mapping.L2: We start with 20 kids awake and 10 are already asleep so 20- 10 = <<20-10=10>>10 kids are still awake
original_solution_mapping.L3: 1/2 of these 10 kids fall asleep next meaning there are 10/2 = <<10/2=5>>5 students still awake

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6144.
    Returns: the number of kids still awake.
    """
    # L1
    total_kids = 20 # 20 kids in preschool
    first_half_divisor = 2 # 1/2 of the kids
    kids_asleep_first_round = total_kids / first_half_divisor

    # L2
    kids_awake_after_first_round = total_kids - kids_asleep_first_round

    # L3
    second_half_divisor = 2 # half of the kids remaining
    kids_still_awake = kids_awake_after_first_round / second_half_divisor

    # FA
    answer = kids_still_awake
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: In a class with {total_kids} kids, {first_half_divisor} of the students have already fallen asleep so {total_kids}/{first_half_divisor} = <<{total_kids}/{first_half_divisor}={kids_asleep_first_round}>>{kids_asleep_first_round} kids are already asleep

We start with {total_kids} kids awake and {kids_asleep_first_round} are already asleep so {total_kids}- {kids_asleep_first_round} = <<{total_kids}-{kids_asleep_first_round}={kids_awake_after_first_round}>>{kids_awake_after_first_round} kids are still awake

{second_half_divisor} of these {kids_awake_after_first_round} kids fall asleep next meaning there are {kids_awake_after_first_round}/{second_half_divisor} = <<{kids_awake_after_first_round}/{second_half_divisor}={kids_still_awake}>>{kids_still_awake} students still awake

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: In a class with 20 kids, 2 of the students have already fallen asleep so 20/2 = <<20/2=10>>10 kids are already asleep
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: We start with 20 kids awake and 2 are already asleep so 20- 2 = <<20-2=18>>18 kids are still awake
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: 2 of these 18 kids fall asleep next meaning there are 18/2 = <<18/2=9>>9 students still awake

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'first_half_divisor' (value: 2) was used instead of 'kids_asleep_first_round' (value: 10.0).
